attributes.additional_details:
In the press today David Cameron makes statements about his ideas and intentions regarding the recent riots.
A good place for him to start would be to STOP this appalling misuse of the benifit system as described by James Dowling in The Daily Express today.
A 2 million pound house in West Hamstead.
This abuse of the system is being carried out by councils around Great Britian,not on this scale I must say,and it makes me very angry when people who have contributed nothing get everything.
If you really want to solve the problems in this country then treat the genuine people with respect.
